Text: It's sad Canonical is now charging to download it's latest release. Thanks to all for keeping the "Open" in Open Source going. I'll be doing my part seeding for quite some time as well.
@MadBOOTer Canonical is not charging to download the latest release. I don't know where you got that.

@MadBOOTer It's not charged? Where did you read that?

If someone tried to sell it to you, report him to the Ubuntu team.
